verses.name: Luke 9:6
verses.text: And they departed, and went through the towns, preaching the gospel, and healing every where.

verses.name: Luke 9:7
verses.text: Now Herod the tetrarch heard of all that was done by him: and he was perplexed, because that it was said of some, that John was risen from the dead;

verses.name: Luke 9:8
verses.text: And of some, that Elias had appeared; and of others, that one of the old prophets was risen again.

verses.name: Luke 9:9
verses.text: And Herod said, John have I beheaded: but who is this, of whom I hear such things? And he desired to see him.
